feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.129.2
entry.content:
• 🎨 Added more social platforms to sameAs generation (#24266) - Troy Ciesco
  • 🐛 Fixed users endpoint to exclude v1 versioning (#24309) - Jannis Fedoruk-Betschki
  • 🐛 Fixed unclickable highlighted text in search - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🐛 fixed unused translation ignores not being reported (#24276) - Vikas Potluri
  • 🌐 Updated Hindi translations for all packages (#24287) - Nishant raj
  • 🌐 Released Portal 2.51.3, Comments 1.2.4, Search 1.8.1 (#24268) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🌐 Updated Spanish translations for Ghost (#24280) - RamonMarino3005
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations (all packages) (#24273) - hondeorua
  • 🌐 Added Turkish translations for Ghost (#24275) - Murat Çorlu

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.129.1...v5.129.2

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.130.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added ~ "contains" support to the match helper (#24066) - Ramrami Mohamed
  • 🎨 Added contributors to meta schema (#24356) - Troy Ciesco
  • 🐛 Fixed loading of staff profile from /edit with >100 staff (#24348) - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed empty tags filter dropdown on pages list screen (#24345) - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed white lists in CTA cards when newsletter has dark background - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed missing bullets/numbers on lists in older Outlook versions - Kevin Ansfield

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.129.2...v5.130.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.130.1
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.130.0...v5.130.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.130.2
entry.content:
• 🔒 Prevented homograph attacks with punycode domains on member signin (#24457) - Michael Barrett

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.130.1...v5.130.2
